Go ahead & experience the sensation of refreshment take in the healing properties of the citrus & herbs that are guaranteed to boost the mind hair & spirit! Description This revolutionary sulphate free 100% vegan thickening shampoo is the first step toward thicker stronger hair. Do you often worry that your hair becomes completely oily & greasy at the end of the day? Do you feel the need to wash your hair daily? If yes then your hair is being robbed of its natural moisture. CetusTM hair thickening shampoo has natural extracts like those of lemon tea tree sage & peppermint to provide your hair that desired thickness delicious scent of lemons & the added strengthening. Details CetusTM hair thickening shampoo gently cleanses the hair & build body with its rich lather. This shampoo is very good if you wish to thicken hydrate & protect your hair. The Sage & Lemon combined with the healing Tea Tree Oil Peppermint & Lavender provide clean fresh feel with fragrance that's crisp! CetusTM hair thickening shampoo penetrates each hair strand increasing the diameter and expanding the hair from the inside out. The result is thicker fuller stronger healthier-looking hair. The unique mix of the thickening agents helps to boost the hair volume & you will notice that limp hair looks healthy & voluminous.
